title: Responsible and ethical commercial biometrics
description: Responsible and ethical commercial biometrics Online January 17, 2023, 12:00pm EST The ethical responsibilities of businesses deploying biometrics for commercial purposes are, in some cases, encoded in laws and regulations. Getting those responsibilities right is crucial to establishing and maintaining trust with users. title: Biometrics applications rebalanced in 2023 to address questions about age and liveness
description: The increasingly rapid growth of biometrics deployments and digital identities issued makes the field both challenging and rewarding to cover. Biometric Update published more than 3,000 news articles in 2023, plus 94 guest posts and nearly a hundred feature stories and interviews. Many of the most widely-read articles over the past year highlight the year’s major trends in biometrics and digital identity. A selection of those articles is presented thematically below to illustrate those trends. Some major trends of the recent past were much less prominent in 2023.
